How to install user defined instances from AWS CloudFormation?

answers.Body:
You have two options

  1. Autoscaling Group - DesiredCapacity and MaxSize - AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup
  2. Spot fleet ( cost savings by 90%) - TargetCapacity - AWS::EC2::SpotFleet

answers.Body: You don't really need custom-resource for that. You can just create your instances as part of AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup. ASG will create required number of instances once you set DesiredCapacity and MaxSize. So if you want 4 instances, you set these values to 4.

history.Text: You don't really need custom-resource for that. You can just create your instances as part of [AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSCloudFormation/latest/UserGuide/aws-properties-as-group.html). ASG will create required number of instances once you set `DesiredCapacity` and `MaxSize`. So if you want 4 instances, you set these values to 4.
